column2: depression_press <- depression %>% group_by(Gender, Academic.Pressure, Depression) %>% summarise(count=n())
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Gender', 'Academic.Pressure'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
ggplot(depression_press, aes(x = Academic.Pressure, y = count, fill = Gender)) +
title = "Academic Pressure of Students and Whether or not they are Depressed",
